title: Finite intersection property
content: While there is not yet a definition, the finite intersection property of a class is introduced by ~ fiint where two textbook definitions are shown to be equivalent. This property is seen often with ordinal numbers ( ~ onin , ~ ordelinel ), chains of sets ordered by the proper subset relation ( ~ sorpssin ), various sets in the field of topology ( ~ inopn , ~ incld , ~ innei , ... ) and "universal" classes like weak universes ( ~ wunin , ~ tskin ) and the class of all sets ( ~ inex1g ).

blocks.name: fipjust
blocks.content: A definition of the finite intersection property of a class based on closure under pairwise intersection of its elements is independent of the dummy variables. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 1-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fipjust(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))), wral(s2, c0, wral(s3, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))), wral(s2, c0, wral(s3, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c0)))), diffss(s0, s3))
  cbvral2v(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c0), wcel(cin(cv(s2), cv(s1)), c0))
  eleq1d(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cin(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  ineq1(cv(s0), cv(s2), cv(s1))
  eleq1d(cin(cv(s2), cv(s1)), c0, cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)))
  ineq2(cv(s1), cv(s3), cv(s2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cin(cv(s2), cv(s1)), c0)
  diff.cin.s(s0, cv(s2), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c0)
  diff.cin.s(s1, cv(s2), cv(s3))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)
  diff.cin.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, cin(cv(s2), cv(s1)), c0)
  diff.cin.s(s3, cv(s2), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fipjust(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ s1)∈ c0))↔ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∀(s3 ∈ c0,(s2 ⋂ s3)∈ c0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
} = {
  a1ii((∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ s1)∈ c0))↔ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∀(s3 ∈ c0,(s2 ⋂ s3)∈ c0))), d(s0, s3))
  cbvral2v(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c0, (s0 ⋂ s1)∈ c0, (s2 ⋂ s3)∈ c0, (s2 ⋂ s1)∈ c0)
  eleq1d((s0 ⋂ s1), c0, (s2 ⋂ s1), s0 = s2)
  ineq1(s0, s2, s1)
  eleq1d((s2 ⋂ s1), c0, (s2 ⋂ s3), s1 = s3)
  ineq2(s1, s3, s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (s2 ⋂ s1), c0)
  diff.cin.s(s0, s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, (s2 ⋂ s3), c0)
  diff.cin.s(s1, s2, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, (s0 ⋂ s1), c0)
  diff.cin.s(s2, s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, (s2 ⋂ s1), c0)
  diff.cin.s(s3, s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
}

blocks.name: cllem0
blocks.content: The class of all sets with property ` ph ( z ) ` is closed under the binary operation on sets defined in ` R ( x , y ) ` . (Contributed by Richard Penner, 3-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cllem0(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c0)))
  -| wceq(c0, cab(s2, w0))
  -| wcel(c1, c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), c1), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w3))
  -| wi(wa(w2, w3), w1)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w3)
} = {
  mpgbir(s0, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c0))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))))
  3bitri(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c0))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w1)), wral(s0, c0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c0)), wral(s1, c0, w1))
  ralbii(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c0), w1)
  elab2(s2, c1, c0, w1, w0)
  elexi(c1, c2)
  ralbii(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w1), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)))
  df-ral(s1, c0, w1)
  df-ral(s0, c0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)))
  alrimiv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)
  syl2anb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1, w2, w3)
  elab2(s2, cv(s0), c0, w2, w0)
  vex(s0)
  elab2(s2, cv(s1), c0, w3, w0)
  vex(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cllem0(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  ⊢ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c0))
  ⊣ c0 = { s2 | w0 }
  ⊣ c1 ∈ c2
  ⊣ (s2 = c1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (s2 = s0 →(w0 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s2 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ ((w2 ∧ w3)→ w1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, w1)
  ⊣ d(s2, w2)
  ⊣ d(s2, w3)
} = {
  mpgbir(s0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c0)), (s0 ∈ c0 → ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 → w1))))
  3bitri(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c0)), ∀(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 → ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 → w1)))), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, w1)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 → w1))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c0), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, w1))
  ralbii(s1, c0, c1 ∈ c0, w1)
  elab2(s2, c1, c0, w1, w0)
  elexi(c1, c2)
  ralbii(s0, c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, w1), ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 → w1)))
  df-ral(s1, c0, w1)
  df-ral(s0, c0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 → w1)))
  alrimiv(s1, s0 ∈ c0, (s1 ∈ c0 → w1))
  ex(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0, w1)
  syl2anb(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0, w1, w2, w3)
  elab2(s2, s0, c0, w2, w0)
  vex(s0)
  elab2(s2, s1, c0, w3, w0)
  vex(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: superficl
blocks.content: The class of all supersets of a class has the finite intersection property. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 1-Jan-2020.) (Proof shortened by Richard Penner, 3-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm superficl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))
  -| wceq(c0, cab(s2, wss(c1, cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  cllem0(s0, s1, s2, c0, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), universe, wss(c1, cv(s2)), wss(c1, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(c1, cv(s1)))
  inex1(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  sseq2(cv(s2), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)
  sseq2(cv(s2), cv(s0), c1)
  sseq2(cv(s2), cv(s1), c1)
  biimpi(wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(c1, cv(s1))), wss(c1, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  ssin(c1, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.wss.s(s2, c1, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.cin.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.wss.s(s2, c1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, c1, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm superficl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ s1)∈ c0))
  ⊣ c0 = { s2 | c1 ⊆ s2 }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  cllem0(s0, s1, s2, c0, (s0 ⋂ s1), universe, c1 ⊆ s2, c1 ⊆(s0 ⋂ s1), c1 ⊆ s0, c1 ⊆ s1)
  inex1(s0, s1)
  vex(s0)
  sseq2(s2, (s0 ⋂ s1), c1)
  sseq2(s2, s0, c1)
  sseq2(s2, s1, c1)
  biimpi((c1 ⊆ s0 ∧ c1 ⊆ s1), c1 ⊆(s0 ⋂ s1))
  ssin(c1, s0, s1)
  diff.wss.s(s2, c1, (s0 ⋂ s1))
  diff.cin.s(s2, s0, s1)
  diff.wss.s(s2, c1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, c1, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: superuncl
blocks.content: The class of all supersets of a class is closed under binary union. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 3-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm superuncl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))
  -| wceq(c0, cab(s2, wss(c1, cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  cllem0(s0, s1, s2, c0, cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), universe, wss(c1, cv(s2)), wss(c1, cun(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(c1, cv(s1)))
  unex(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  sseq2(cv(s2), cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)
  sseq2(cv(s2), cv(s0), c1)
  sseq2(cv(s2), cv(s1), c1)
  adantr(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(c1, cv(s1)), wss(c1, cun(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  ssun3(c1, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.wss.s(s2, c1, cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.cun.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.wss.s(s2, c1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, c1, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm superuncl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋃ s1)∈ c0))
  ⊣ c0 = { s2 | c1 ⊆ s2 }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  cllem0(s0, s1, s2, c0, (s0 ⋃ s1), universe, c1 ⊆ s2, c1 ⊆(s0 ⋃ s1), c1 ⊆ s0, c1 ⊆ s1)
  unex(s0, s1)
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  sseq2(s2, (s0 ⋃ s1), c1)
  sseq2(s2, s0, c1)
  sseq2(s2, s1, c1)
  adantr(c1 ⊆ s0, c1 ⊆ s1, c1 ⊆(s0 ⋃ s1))
  ssun3(c1, s0, s1)
  diff.wss.s(s2, c1, (s0 ⋃ s1))
  diff.cun.s(s2, s0, s1)
  diff.wss.s(s2, c1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, c1, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: ssficl
blocks.content: The class of all subsets of a class has the finite intersection property. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 1-Jan-2020.) (Proof shortened by Richard Penner, 3-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssficl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))
  -| wceq(c0, cab(s2, wss(cv(s2), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  cllem0(s0, s1, s2, c0, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), universe, wss(cv(s2), c1), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s1), c1))
  inex1(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  sseq1(cv(s2), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)
  sseq1(cv(s2), cv(s0), c1)
  sseq1(cv(s2), cv(s1), c1)
  adantr(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s1), c1), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
  ssinss1(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))
  diff.wss.s(s2, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)
  diff.cin.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.wss.s(s2, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ssficl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ s1)∈ c0))
  ⊣ c0 = { s2 | s2 ⊆ c1 }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  cllem0(s0, s1, s2, c0, (s0 ⋂ s1), universe, s2 ⊆ c1, (s0 ⋂ s1)⊆ c1, s0 ⊆ c1, s1 ⊆ c1)
  inex1(s0, s1)
  vex(s0)
  sseq1(s2, (s0 ⋂ s1), c1)
  sseq1(s2, s0, c1)
  sseq1(s2, s1, c1)
  adantr(s0 ⊆ c1, s1 ⊆ c1, (s0 ⋂ s1)⊆ c1)
  ssinss1(s0, c1, s1)
  diff.wss.s(s2, (s0 ⋂ s1), c1)
  diff.cin.s(s2, s0, s1)
  diff.wss.s(s2, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, s1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: ssuncl
blocks.content: The class of all subsets of a class is closed under binary union. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 3-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssuncl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))
  -| wceq(c0, cab(s2, wss(cv(s2), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  cllem0(s0, s1, s2, c0, cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), universe, wss(cv(s2), c1), wss(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s1), c1))
  unex(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  sseq1(cv(s2), cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)
  sseq1(cv(s2), cv(s0), c1)
  sseq1(cv(s2), cv(s1), c1)
  biimpi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s1), c1)), wss(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
  unss(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))
  diff.wss.s(s2, cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)
  diff.cun.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.wss.s(s2, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ssuncl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋃ s1)∈ c0))
  ⊣ c0 = { s2 | s2 ⊆ c1 }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  cllem0(s0, s1, s2, c0, (s0 ⋃ s1), universe, s2 ⊆ c1, (s0 ⋃ s1)⊆ c1, s0 ⊆ c1, s1 ⊆ c1)
  unex(s0, s1)
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  sseq1(s2, (s0 ⋃ s1), c1)
  sseq1(s2, s0, c1)
  sseq1(s2, s1, c1)
  biimpi((s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c1), (s0 ⋃ s1)⊆ c1)
  unss(s0, c1, s1)
  diff.wss.s(s2, (s0 ⋃ s1), c1)
  diff.cun.s(s2, s0, s1)
  diff.wss.s(s2, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, s1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: ssdifcl
blocks.content: The class of all subsets of a class is closed under class difference. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 3-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssdifcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))
  -| wceq(c0, cab(s2, wss(cv(s2), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  cllem0(s0, s1, s2, c0, cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), universe, wss(cv(s2), c1), wss(cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s1), c1))
  difexi(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  sseq1(cv(s2), cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)
  sseq1(cv(s2), cv(s0), c1)
  sseq1(cv(s2), cv(s1), c1)
  adantr(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s1), c1), wss(cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
  ssdifss(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))
  diff.wss.s(s2, cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)
  diff.cdif.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.wss.s(s2, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ssdifcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 \ s1)∈ c0))
  ⊣ c0 = { s2 | s2 ⊆ c1 }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  cllem0(s0, s1, s2, c0, (s0 \ s1), universe, s2 ⊆ c1, (s0 \ s1)⊆ c1, s0 ⊆ c1, s1 ⊆ c1)
  difexi(s0, s1)
  vex(s0)
  sseq1(s2, (s0 \ s1), c1)
  sseq1(s2, s0, c1)
  sseq1(s2, s1, c1)
  adantr(s0 ⊆ c1, s1 ⊆ c1, (s0 \ s1)⊆ c1)
  ssdifss(s0, c1, s1)
  diff.wss.s(s2, (s0 \ s1), c1)
  diff.cdif.s(s2, s0, s1)
  diff.wss.s(s2, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, s1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: sssymdifcl
blocks.content: The class of all subsets of a class is closed under symmetric difference. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 3-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sssymdifcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cun(cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(cv(s1), cv(s0))), c0)))
  -| wceq(c0, cab(s2, wss(cv(s2), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  cllem0(s0, s1, s2, c0, cun(cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(cv(s1), cv(s0))), universe, wss(cv(s2), c1), wss(cun(cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(cv(s1), cv(s0))), c1), wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s1), c1))
  unex(cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  ax-mp(wcel(cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), universe), wcel(cv(s0), universe))
  vex(s0)
  difexg(cv(s0), universe, cv(s1))
  ax-mp(wcel(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s0)), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe))
  vex(s1)
  difexg(cv(s1), universe, cv(s0))
  sseq1(cv(s2), cun(cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(cv(s1), cv(s0))), c1)
  sseq1(cv(s2), cv(s0), c1)
  sseq1(cv(s2), cv(s1), c1)
  syl2an(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cv(s1), c1), wss(cun(cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(cv(s1), cv(s0))), c1), wss(cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wss(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c1))
  ssdifss(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))
  ssdifss(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))
  biimpi(wa(wss(cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wss(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c1)), wss(cun(cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(cv(s1), cv(s0))), c1))
  unss(cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1, cdif(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  diff.wss.s(s2, cun(cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(cv(s1), cv(s0))), c1)
  diff.cun.s(s2, cdif(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  diff.cdif.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cdif.s(s2, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  diff.wss.s(s2, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sssymdifcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,((s0 \ s1)⋃(s1 \ s0))∈ c0))
  ⊣ c0 = { s2 | s2 ⊆ c1 }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  cllem0(s0, s1, s2, c0, ((s0 \ s1)⋃(s1 \ s0)), universe, s2 ⊆ c1, ((s0 \ s1)⋃(s1 \ s0))⊆ c1, s0 ⊆ c1, s1 ⊆ c1)
  unex((s0 \ s1), (s1 \ s0))
  ax-mp((s0 \ s1)∈ 𝕌, s0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(s0)
  difexg(s0, universe, s1)
  ax-mp((s1 \ s0)∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(s1)
  difexg(s1, universe, s0)
  sseq1(s2, ((s0 \ s1)⋃(s1 \ s0)), c1)
  sseq1(s2, s0, c1)
  sseq1(s2, s1, c1)
  syl2an(s0 ⊆ c1, s1 ⊆ c1, ((s0 \ s1)⋃(s1 \ s0))⊆ c1, (s0 \ s1)⊆ c1, (s1 \ s0)⊆ c1)
  ssdifss(s0, c1, s1)
  ssdifss(s1, c1, s0)
  biimpi(((s0 \ s1)⊆ c1 ∧(s1 \ s0)⊆ c1), ((s0 \ s1)⋃(s1 \ s0))⊆ c1)
  unss((s0 \ s1), c1, (s1 \ s0))
  diff.wss.s(s2, ((s0 \ s1)⋃(s1 \ s0)), c1)
  diff.cun.s(s2, (s0 \ s1), (s1 \ s0))
  diff.cdif.s(s2, s0, s1)
  diff.cdif.s(s2, s1, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wss.s(s2, s1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: fiinfi
blocks.content: If two classes have the finite intersection property, then so does their intersection. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 1-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fiinfi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))), diffss(s0, s1))
  mpbird(w0, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))), wral(s0, cin(c1, c2), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))))
  mpbird(w0, wral(s0, cin(c1, c2), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))), wral(s0, cin(c1, c2), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))))
  mpbird(w0, wral(s0, cin(c1, c2), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))), wral(s0, cin(c1, c2), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c1, c2)))))
  sylibr(w0, wral(s0, cin(c1, c2), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c1, c2)))), wral(s0, cin(c1, c2), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wa(wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))))
  sylanbrc(w0, wral(s0, cin(c1, c2), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wa(wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))), wral(s0, cin(c1, c2), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))), wral(s0, cin(c1, c2), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2))))
  syl(w0, wral(s0, cin(c1, c2), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))
  ralimi2(s0, c1, cin(c1, c2), wral(s1, c1, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  imim12i(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(c1, c2)), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  elinel1(cv(s0), c1, c2)
  ralimi2(s1, c1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
  imim1i(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(cv(s1), cin(c1, c2)))
  elinel1(cv(s1), c1, c2)
  syl(w0, wral(s0, cin(c1, c2), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2))), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2))))
  ralimi2(s0, c2, cin(c1, c2), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))
  imim12i(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(c1, c2)), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))
  elinel2(cv(s0), c1, c2)
  ralimi2(s1, c2, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2))
  imim1i(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), wcel(cv(s1), cin(c1, c2)))
  elinel2(cv(s1), c1, c2)
  r19.26-2(s0, s1, cin(c1, c2), cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2))
  2ralbii(s0, s1, cin(c1, c2), cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))
  elin(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1, c2)
  ralbidv(s0, cin(c1, c2), w0, wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c1, c2))))
  ralbidv(s1, cin(c1, c2), w0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c1, c2)))
  eleq2d(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cin(c1, c2), w0)
  ralbidv(s0, cin(c1, c2), w0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)), wral(s1, cin(c1, c2), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))
  raleqdv(s1, c0, cin(c1, c2), w0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))
  raleqdv(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2), w0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))
  diff.cin.s(s1, c1, c2)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c1, c2)
}
